channel.title: Hosting
channel.description: Does anyone Know how to host on Comp Via Windows 7? Because i don't wanna spend money on a vps when theres only about 3 players. if someone could please give me a guide or something, i'd apriciate it.

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Hosting on any machine, whether a VPS or a standard PC at your home is exactly the same.

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

He says there are only bout 3 people playing his RSPS and he doesn’t want to buy a VPS for that.

He probably means how to host it to play with a few friends of him.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

pot up pls:

Does anyone Know how to host on Comp Via Windows 7? Because i don’t wanna spend money on a vps when theres only about 3 players. if someone could please give me a guide or something, i’d apriciate it.

If you host on vps its a lot faster. I would get vps and a better server at the same time. Promote it with ads and youtube videos. It will get popular. Also get your players to spam other popular servers that arent as good as yours. Like GodzHell perfect place to spam it sucks like crazy but it was one of the first RSPS so it is popular. My server base is better than GodzHell. And I just started on it. Lol… I would also get a forums and website for your server. Get a webclient too that helps a lot. You can pay people to make them for you. Make sure the server has decent graphics not too high though coz a lot of people on rsps have slow computers because they are young. Make lots of events and stuff too. Good luck :3

Read full topic
